text: The lances of the Xianbei are rightfully feared among the peoples of the steppes, and in the right hands should never be underestimated.
The villages of the Han shall weep with blood, or submit to the might of the north.
Navigating the endless, barren plains is no easy feat, and it takes a skilled mind and a keen pair of eyes.
Navigating the endless, barren plains is no easy feat, and it takes a skilled mind and a keen pair of eyes.
The most talented of predators can eliminate their prey before they even notice that it is too late.
The blades of the Xianbei are particularly sharp, wielded by warriors of great proficiency.
The patriarch of an entire clan of Xianbei, this one proudly spreads the heritage and traditions of his people whilst also looking towards the future.
Formally of the Han, this one was banished or shunned to live amongst the tribes. Now, he has embraced their culture and language, whilst teaching them everything there is to know about his own.
A junior member of a noble family, this one nontherless has great influence, and holds sway over many of their peers.
A junior member of a noble family, this one nontherless has great influence, and holds sway over many of their peers.
Fortune's favour is as fickle as a candle in the wind.
This one has converted to a teachings of a new religion, and spreads its tenants to all who will listen to him.
A lifetime of living on the borders with the Han has allowed this man to pick up their methods of governance.
Crafting fine art and tools out of metals is a crucial skill, and one that has brought the Xianbei many advantages.
Crafting fine art and tools out of metals is a crucial skill, and one that has brought the Xianbei many advantages.
The husbandry of animals is the lifeblood of the nomadic life.
This one is a respected and leading figure amongst her local community, and strives for its safety and prosperity.
